document_data.name: Lerek Dashlynd
document_data.mainbody: '''Lerek Dashlynd''' was an agent who represented the interests of certain wealthy individuals from [[Waterdeep]] in the city of [[Port Nyanzaru]] in [[Chult]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships:
He was a [[spy]] for the [[Lords' Alliance]].

When he acquired something for his benefactors, he hired a [[cleric]] to confirm the authenticity of the item by casting ''[[augury]]''.
document_data.History: During the events of the [[death curse]],{{ToA-time}} Lerek was tasked with acquiring an accurate [[map]] of Chult showing the location of two important ruins: [[Nangalore]] and [[Orolunga]]. He was able to offer an entire [[sailing ship]] as compensation for such a map.
